H0.text: An encephalogram is an X-Ray photograph of which part of the human body. Skull

H1.text: An encephalogram is an X-Ray photograph of which part of the human body. Spinal Cord

H2.text: An encephalogram is an X-Ray photograph of which part of the human body. Eyes

H3.text: An encephalogram is an X-Ray photograph of which part of the human body. Brain

A4.text: Electroencephalography (EEG) is a method to record an electrogram of the spontaneous electrical activity of the brain.

A5.text: Traditional plain X-rays are less useful in the imaging of soft tissues such as the brain or muscle.
